fullstack-web.summary: Full Stack web developer with more than 5 years of experience developing small and medium scale web projects. Specialized in MERN stack with more than 4 years of experience working with ReactJS and relational and non-relational databases. Expert in Test Driven Development and agile methodologies. I aspire to be part of a multidisciplinary team where I have to push my reasoning and programming skills to the maximum. I am not afraid to learn new technologies or adapt to different environments and work methodologies. My biggest goal in life is to work and grow with professionals who are dedicated in their career and life. I hate wasting time.

experience.title: MERN Stack Developer
experience.description: Developer of the Research Web Platform of the University of Havana using MERN Stack, Electron and Docker
details: Used ReactJs, Server Side rendering with Next.js and Typescript.
Using MongoDB, ExpressJs and Apollo Server for backend.
Using Apollo Graphql and Apollo CLI for API communication.
Using React I18Next for internationalization and locale.
Behavior Driven Development Approach using Jest, Enzyme and SuperTest.
Using Electron react for desktop app generation.
Local deployment using Docker and Docker-Compose.

experience.title: Full-Stack Developer

details: Develop frontend using ReactJs, Typescript, Apollo Graphql and React Rainbow Library.
Backend using Golang libraries as chi-router, jwt, go-graphql.

Develop integration mechanism for the balance platforms using OAuth protocol.
Deployment using Docker and Docker-Compose.
